{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_SetSpeed}} {{note|This function is effectively deprecated in [[ZScript]], since an actor's {{c|speed}} variable can be modified directly, for example: {{c|ptr.speed {{=}} 10}}.}}
'''A_SetSpeed''' (float ''speed'' [, int ''pointer''])
==Usage== Changes the calling actor's or the pointed to actor's speed to ''speed''. It can be used with the ''speed'' [[DECORATE expressions|DECORATE variable]] to modify the actor's current speed. Note that changing a projectile's speed will not affect it's velocity unless it is a [[Action_functions#Missile_movement|seeker missile]].
===Parameters=== * ''speed'': The value to set the actor's speed to. * ''pointer'': The actor to change its speed. This is an [[actor pointer]]. Default is {{c|{{const|AAPTR_DEFAULT}}}}, which corresponds to the calling actor.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
==See also== *[[A_ScaleVelocity]]
